verbs.description: Federal investigators [V: have] monitored the phone lines of Michael Cohen , the longtime personal lawyer for President Donald Trump who is under investigation for a payment he made to an adult film star who alleged she had an affair with Trump , according to multiple senior officials and individuals with knowledge of the legal proceedings involving Cohen .
